question: Who is responsible for initial documentation in your company?

How are you satisfied with online accounting systems for needs of your company? (1 - in any cases I would prefer offline accounting systems, 10 - in any cases I would prefer online accounting systems)

How often do you need to create a bill?

answers.text: More than one time per day
